name: Title To be decided
description:
The third early build of the top-down shooter I'm working on. Please note sound and animations are absent, as well as hover-over tool tips. 

Tutorial (yet to be added in-game) 

WASD - move

mouse - aim

primary - shoot

secondary - multi-shot

shift/space - dash

e - collect all arrows.

q - shoot arrow volley.

You have health/shields/mana
